title: Decanter And Stopper, 1801–50
creditline: Bequest of Mrs. John Innes Kane
description: Part a (decanter): Globular body with incurved, panelled neck.  Decorated with a narrow band each of fluting and facetted diamonds.  Part b (stopper): Octagonal, with cross-hatching on top; does not fit part a properly.

tombstone.epitaph:
Decanter And Stopper, 1801–50.
1801–50. glass, cut. Bequest of Mrs. John Innes Kane. 1926-22-495-a,b.
